about_the_game:
Escape from this dark dimension and return to reality!


When transported to a dark dimension inhabited by strange dolls, you find yourself in the body of one of them, where the sole priority is to survive and escape this new nightmare. However, you now face an unusual enemy: a war veteran who still sees himself on the battlefield and is determined to eliminate all his "enemies" in this unfamiliar world!


Play with your friends!
Play with your friends in private matches or in public global lobbies, with up to 5 people, where one participant in the group will be chosen as the hunter and the others as prey!


Challenge of the game.
At the beginning of the game, one player is chosen to be the hunter. They will play as an armed character, hunting down the other players who must survive. To survive, players must blend into the environment alongside other lifeless dolls, mimicking them and controlling their fear. The hunter can detect fear and identify which doll is a player. If the hunter shoots a lifeless doll, they are penalized. However, hitting a player summons a monster to assist in hunting down the other survivors. If the hunter delays action or eliminates the wrong targets, the survivors can activate a revenge system to counterattack the hunter and achieve victory.

Escape, hide, and blend into your surroundings; survive as long as possible until it's time to counterattack and achieve victory!

Game Features


  • Play in first person as the hunter or in third person as the survivor.
  • Create public or private lobbies to play with other players.
  • Chat with other players through voice or text chat.
  • Enjoy a richly detailed environment while you try to survive.
  • Have fun and interact with your friends!

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: Adult content - This game contains implied nudity and scenes of violence, including murders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
